[all packages] [zeta.content.nmz.MZ] [class hierarchy] [index]

pure interface of class zeta.content.nmz.MZ.Expr

The documentated page. 
public static class Expr
  extends MZTerm
{
    public Locator locator;
    public case Denotation(String value);
    public case Call(Name name,
                     Seq<Expr> args);
    public case Variable(Name name);
    public case Term(Name name,
                     Seq<Expr> args);
    public case Apply(Expr func,
                      Expr arg);
    public case Singleton(Expr arg);
    public case Hom(Name name,
                    Expr arg);
    public case Empty();
    public case Universal();
    public case Intersection(Expr left,
                             Expr right);
    public case Union(Expr left,
                      Expr right);
    public case Complement(Expr arg);
    public case Conditional(Expr cond,
                            Expr left,
                            Expr right);
    public case Translate(Expr arg,
                          Expr source,
                          Expr target);
    public case Let(Name name,
                    Expr def,
                    Expr scope);
    public case Schema(Expr binder,
                       Set<Name> freeVars,
                       Seq<Property> props);
    public final Expr set(Locator locator);
    public final Expr setFrom(Expr other);
    public Set<Name> freeVars();
    public Set<Name> freeVars(Set<Name> exclude);
    public final Expr substitute(Map<Name, Expr> sb);
    public Format toFormat(FormatInfo info);
}
